pkgmetadata.longdescription: This version of Hercules 4.x Hyperion is a SoftDevLabs maintained version of the Hercules emulator containing fixes made by David B. Trout and others for bugs that may still exist in the original hercules-390 version of Hercules 4.0 Hyperion, as well as enhancements and improvements to the overall functionality above and beyond what is provided by the hercules-390 version of Hercules.
